meanings.definition: To bind or gather together in a bundle or group.
meanings.sent1: She fagoted the sticks to make a strong structure.
meanings.sent2: The students fagoted their ideas to create a cohesive project.
meanings.sent3: The ants fagoted the food crumbs into a neat pile.
meanings.sent4: The team fagoted their efforts for a successful outcome.
meanings.sent5: He fagoted the papers into a neat stack on his desk.

meanings.definition: A decorative design in which groups of parallel lines are crossed by another set of lines in a diagonal pattern.
meanings.sent1: The artist created a beautiful fagoted pattern on the fabric.
meanings.sent2: The quilt had intricate fagoted details along the edges.
meanings.sent3: The fagoted design on the vase added an elegant touch to the room.
meanings.sent4: Her dress featured a fagoted trim that caught everyone's eye.
meanings.sent5: The fagoted artwork on the wall mesmerized the visitors.
